net.derquinse.common.orm.hib

Class AbstractHibernateSequenceDAO<T extends Sequence>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.orm.hib.AbstractHibernateSequenceDAO<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Sequence type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SequenceDAO
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HibernateSequenceDAO

    public abstract class AbstractHibernateSequenceDAO<T extends Sequence>
extends Object
implements SequenceDAO
    Abstract DAO a sequence entity. WARNING: Transactional sequences are a source of locks and may hurt scalability.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez
